review: Carbamazepine has been a miracle for schizoaffective disorder
Tegretol (carbamazepine):I became very ill shortly after starting  the medication.Unbearable  itching as well as yellow jaundice dark urine as well as feeling  very unwell

Tegretol (carbamazepine):Tegretol is very effective for my mood swings and hallucinations. It helps slow the racing thoughts and hyperactivity and thinking people are out to get me and helps with hearing voices. When I do not take it, everyone can notice a huge difference in how I act.
